title: Draft a Breaking News Article
description: A major, unexpected event has occurred. A reporter must quickly write a short, accurate article for immediate publication online.

tasks.description: Gather the essential, confirmed facts of the event (who, what, when, where, why).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent compiles a bulleted list of the core, verified facts.

tasks.description: Write a 300-word article using the inverted pyramid structure, starting with the most critical information.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a concise and clearly written news brief.

tasks.description: Include a line stating 'This is a developing story and will be updated.'
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent includes the appropriate disclaimer for a breaking news situation.
